ygData.subject: To all low and mid lvl bards who die alot...
ygData.msgSnippet: It gets a LOT better in the future. Ever since lvl 30 and up i noticed i could start using all those songs that just got me killed asap before. Largos was the
ygData.messageBody:
It gets a LOT better in the future. Ever since lvl 30 and up i noticed i
could start using all those songs that just got me killed asap before.
Largos was the quickest way for me to kill myself in unrest when i was
around lvl 20 since one pulse of the song and everything ganked me, nm that
all the tanks and wizies almost had it dead. Now at lvl 43 im trying out
all the songs that i wanted to before and finding out that most creatures
just dont care. They go right on attacking the proper person :)

I just rememberd when i was lvl 20 how discouraged i got over the 'Gank the
bard first' syndrom that most of the mobs seem to suffer from. Now i still
get attacked a lot, but it seems much more in tune with what everybody else
has to suffer through.

Gendal Concorden, lvl 43 bard
3 time recipient of the 'Worst dressed on tunare' award.
